abstract: Citigroup will slash some 1,000 jobs at its Japanese brokerage unit as part of the ailing U.S. banking giant’s efforts to survive the financial meltdown, a report said Wednesday, according to The Associated Press.
lead_paragraph: Citigroup will slash some 1,000 jobs at its Japanese brokerage unit as part of the ailing U.S. banking giant’s efforts to survive the financial meltdown, a report said Wednesday, according to The Associated Press.

headline.main: Citigroup to Axe 1,000 at Japan Unit, Report Says
